owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.gasPriceBid: same as gasPriceBid parameter of inbox.createRetryableTicket*
params.maxGas: same as maxGas parameter of inbox.createRetryableTicket
params.maxSubmissionCost: same as maxSubmissionCost parameter of inbox.createRetryableTicket
params.payLoad: message calldata that will be executed by l2MessageExecutorProxy.
params.target: address of the target contract on arbitrum.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

RetryableTicketCreated(uint256).notice: Emitted when a retryable ticket is created for relaying L1 message to L2.

inbox().notice: Address of arbitrum's L1 inbox contract.

relayMessage(address,bytes,uint256,uint2.notice: sends message received from timeLock to L2MessageExecutorProxy.

renounceOwnership().notice: renounceOwnership has been disabled so that the contract is never left without a onwer

timeLock().notice: Address of the governance TimeLock contract.
